Adjusting my score since rotten tomatoes doesn't count 1/2 star ratings.

I would go into all the faults of The Last Jedi\, but there are so many and other reviewers have already covered them.  Interestingly\, the best response the apologists can muster in defense of this movie is "Get over yourselves" or "Silly\, intolerant fanboys" instead of addressing the movie's glaring flaws.

And no\, this isn't a fake review.  If you want to read fake reviews\, then look no further than the Critics' reviews.  91% is about as fake as you can get for this nonsense.

BTW\, The Last Jedi doesn't show women in a strong light.  Quite the opposite.  It portrays them as incompetent nincompoops.  But then again\, everyone looks like an idiot in this movie so that isn't really saying much.
